summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Willow Street, from California Avenue to Fauntleroy Boulevard, by grading, paving, constructing concrete walks, watermains and sewers, all in accordance with Majority Petition, File \#56417 of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
